title: My computer lags when i play lol
body:
As a owner of a gtx 1080 i don't understand why i only get 200 Fps on medium settings and some times my computer lags to 20 fps 

If some one could find out a a fix to this issue it would help a lot

replies.body: i tried that and it did not help do you think it could me a problem with my gpu?

It depends a lot on what exactly is going on when that fps drops, but there's a chance this could all be happening due to some corrupted game files that your card isn't able to process very well. It's also likely that this is all being caused by an outdated graphics driver too. Check those out, as well as the other steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), but hit me back if that doesn't help.
